channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Regionals 2024
channel.desc: Highlights from the Haka Regionals 2024. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka To Worlds
channel.desc: Following the lives of the New Zealand Waka Ama Elite Junior Men and Women's teams as they train their hearts out in the quest for gold at the 2022 IVF World Sprint Championships. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huiki Haere
channel.desc: We drop an interchangeable cast of young M?ori siblings into socially and culturally challenging situations and sit back and watch the hilarity. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Big Trip
channel.desc: PREMIERE: A bear and his animal friends embark on a journey to return a lost baby panda to its rightful home.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rambo: First Blood
channel.desc: Vietnam vet John Rambo drifts into a rural Washington town, triggering hostile treatment by the sheriff. Conflict escalates, forcing Rambo into a survivalist guerrilla battle in the woods while evading law enforcement. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Pai
channel.desc: Kori learns all about his favourite shape, tapawh?, and we make some amazing square bubbles! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: He Rourou
channel.desc: An instructional cooking series aimed at tamariki and wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After a narrow escape, Kura realises she has no choice and sets off to find a way through the treacherous lava streams towards the misty maunga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Nan falls sick so Marama and N?kau return to look after Tai and the farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fly My Pepeha
channel.desc: Tamariki series offering an immersive journey into the heart of the rich landscapes of Aotearoa and M?ori history. Using drone technology, viewers will explore diverse landscapes and traditions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024
channel.desc: Highlights of the most prestigious M?ori kapa haka event on the school calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Big Trip
channel.desc: A bear and his animal friends embark on a journey to return a lost baby panda to its rightful home.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Bamay
channel.desc: A showcase of Australia?s most diverse and stunning landscapes, shot from the air and inspired by the word Bamay, which means land in the Bundjalung language from northern New South Wales. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: Tui saddles up starter horse Arthur for the first time then heads to Gisborne to see Jenny whose horse suffers from separation anxiety. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te W?nanga o Raukawa Pre-Season Netball Tournament 2025
channel.desc: Live coverage of the Annual Te W?nanga O Raukawa Pre-Season Netball Tournament. This is the last hit-out for teams ahead of the ANZ Premiership. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara
channel.desc: Kara?s ever-present charm is accompanied by the joy and laughter she brings to any project She is a passionate activist for M?ori, and uses her public platform to inform and educate her audience about important issues. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Siblings Eraia and Lahaina Kiel teach basic skills in poi, haka and other traditional M?ori performing arts. (R).
